features: Includes 3 bottles (12 fluid ounce) of Vagisil pH balance daily intimate vaginal wash
All over body wash with LactoPrebiotic which helps nourish naturally-occurring friendly bacteria & helps support healthy intimate skin
Clinically proven to help maintain a healthy pH balance to fortify natural defenses; formulated at the proper pH for the vaginal area
Dye-Free, hypoallergenic formula. Gynecologist and clinically tested.

body.description: Did you know that your period, menopause, having sex, even some daily cleansers can disrupt your vaginal balance? Only Vagisil pH balance vaginal wash has lacto prebiotic. It's clinically proven to help maintain a healthy pH balance to fortify natural defenses. Use it every day to help support a healthy pH balance. And a balanced pH is an important step towards good feminine health.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: From patented Odor Block technology to Lactoprebiotic and Natural Essential Oils, Vagisil performance cleansing products bring advanced intimate skincare to washes and wipes. They’re so gentle and effective, you’ll want to use them all over.

Feel all-day confidence with up to 24-hour freshness Intimate care science has come a long way. Odor Block technology doesn’t just mask odors, it encapsulates odor molecules and weighs them down, so you’ll feel fresh.

An optimal pH level is just the beginning Formulated by intimate skincare experts for vulvar skin, within the optimal pH range to help maintain the body’s natural defenses. Hypoallergenic, gynecologist & dermatologist tested.

Tested by GYNs and trusted by women For almost 50 years, Vagisil has developed leading intimate care products using empathy and expertise to ensure they address women's needs. Our treatments and daily care products are gynecologist and dermatologist tested for safety. They're made in FDA-registered manufacturing facilities and meet the highest quality standards. We're constantly connecting with consumers who use our products to ensure they're feeling happy, healthy, and satisfied.

Healthy Detox Wash Healthy Detox gently washes away harmful bacteria from head to toe with natural tea tree, rosemary & eucalyptus essential oils, plus neem extract. No added fragrance. Hypoallergenic & pH balanced. SHOP Odor Block Wash Odor Block wash has patent Odor Block technology to help stop odor from happening. For 24-hour freshness and confidence even after a workout. Hypoallergenic, pH balanced & clinically tested. SHOP Odor Block Wipes Sweat, periods & bladder leaks can cause intimate odor. Odor Block Freshening Wipes can help eliminate odor quickly & conveniently on-the-go. With Odor Block technology for 24-hour freshness. SHOP Odor Block Dry Wash Spray Odor Block Dry Wash spray is an easy way to feel fresh & clean when you can't shower. Spray on skin or undies for a burst of freshness with Odor Block technology. No white residue. Hypoallergenic. SHOP pH Balance Wash Only Vagisil pH Balance Wash has LactoPrebiotic. Use it every day to help maintain a healthy pH balance. A balanced pH is an important step toward good intimate health. Light & fresh scent. SHOP

One wash for head to toe — and your vulva, too. 80% of women use a regular body wash with fragrance to cleanse all-over — including their vulva. But not all body washes are formulated at the appropriate pH range for the vulvar area. Fact is, all Vagisil washes are pH balanced at 4.5-5.5 to help maintain a healthy vulvar pH. Tested by board certified Gynecologists and Dermatologists, these washes have been shown to be gentle enough for your intimate area and all over. So, you can feel good using a Vagisil wash as your one-and-only wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars keeps the kitty clean
reviews.reviewText: Well, what can I say.. Im a pretty active female...yes I workout---ALOT So keeping it freshly down there is super important. I've been a fan of this product for a while not, its good for sensitive skin and no weird fruity smells... I mean it smells like it supposed to smell, nothing fancy. Best part is that it takes very good care of your lady bits.The freshness pretty much last all day, cant really say anything beyond that since I have the bad habit of taking a shower on a daily basis... I know right, how weird. Anyways, if you want to treat your kitty cat right this is a great product to keep it classy and clean ladies.P.S husband approved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where have you been my whole life! Especially at 50!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t believe I’m just trying this now! If I only knew it would instantly get rid of any odor I would have bought stock in this stuff yrs ago! It’s very gentle and no perfume or cover up smells. It just simply neutralizes any bad odor…I am completely amazed! I highly recommend this product! One less thing to be conscious of. Yay!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These body washes are amazing! You can use it anywhere on your body, not just in private! My goal has always been to discover the ideal cleaning solution that won't burn or cause discomfort on my intimate areas. This actually completes the task! It improved my PH balance as well!

reviews.reviewerName: I love that it does not taste super strong and it doesn’t sting. Really great product. Leaves my mouth feeling minty fresh.
